testcase.name: TC02 kullanici hesap olusturabilmeli
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "apUrl" anasayfasinda.......................................passed Then kullanici singine tiklar...............................................passed And kullanici create account bolumune email adresi girer....................passed And kullanici create an account butonuna basar..............................passed And kullanici gerekli bilgileri girer.......................................passed And kullanici Register butonuna basar.......................................passed Then hesap olustugunu dogrular..............................................passed
